summary: Transitive dependency vulnerability in ava testing framework where got library (v9.6.0) allows redirect to UNIX socket (CVE-2022-33987). Resolved by upgrading to ava 4.0.0 which includes got 12.1.0+.
userImpact: Testing framework vulnerable to UNIX socket redirect attacks through transitive dependency chain.
rootCause: got library version 9.6.0 (transitive dependency through ava -> update-notifier -> latest-version -> package-json -> got) allows redirect to UNIX socket
proposedFix: Upgrade ava to version 4.0.0 or got to version 12.2.0+
resolutionDetails: Issue automatically remediated by dependency version upgrade
keyQuote: The got package before 12.1.0 (also fixed in 11.8.5) for Node.js allows a redirect to a UNIX socket.
